result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jacob C. Lootans

defendant.name: Lootans, Jacob C.
defendant.address: 621 W Grand Ave, Eau Claire, WI 54703

records.addlTxt:
Cases called at 11:04 AM:  20CM855, 20CM856, 20CM1143, 20CM1220, 21CM860, 22CM635.
Defendant Jacob C. Lootans in court with Attorney Robert Allen Thorson.  Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Agreement has been reached. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. 
Attorney Thorson indicates that he has not completed the plea paperwork with the Defendant and requests time to do that now.
Off record at 11:06 AM. Cases re-called at 11:28 AM.
Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
20CM856: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1: Operating with Restricted Controlled Substance in Blood-3rd Offense. Priors acknowledged.
Court accepts the pleas and finds the Defendant guilty. Attorney Thorson makes a statement on the Defendant's behalf.
Defendant is sentenced to a $1,744 fine/costs, plus the Mayo Blood Draw Fee, 24 Month IID, 24 Month DL Revocation, 60 Days of Jail with Huber to begin immediately. AODA and follow through with recommendations. 
20CM1143: Defendant pleads No Contest to Count 1: Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor. Defendant is sentenced to Court Costs/surcharges, Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge. 
Remaining charges are dismissed and read in. Defendant is not granted any sentence credit.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Case called at 11:13 AM.
Defendant Jacob C. Lootans not in court. Attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.
State notes the Defendant has court scheduled for 9/16/22 at 2:00 PM  in Branch 1 and requests this case go in at that time. Court so orders.
Initial Appearance:9/16/22 at 2:00 PM.
